segments.text: My attention is drawn to the center of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy, precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet where a "COOKIE JAR" is visible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is already inside, grabbing the treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see it tipping backwards at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands nearby, arm outstretched, patiently waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly in on the secret cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a daring feat they're attempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so intent on their sweet mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of them crashing down makes me wince.
segments.speaker: PAR
